dialogues.name: ClassmateA
dialogues.content: Hi, Vincent, do you want to play basketball together? Let's relax a bit.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: No, thanks. I need to get back home quickly to continue my review.

dialogues.name: ClassmateA
dialogues.content: The new student who joined our class today is so pretty!

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Are you talking about Yvonne? (She does seem quite beautiful.)
